title: Mastery Page Crashing!!!
body: Mastery Page crashed as I was trying to change. It locked up and wouldnt allow me to make a new one or anything. This was right before a game I am about to be in. I now have zero masteries.. Please fix!!

replies.body: This issue is usually a cause of third party programs being used, and not interacting well with league.  If you have any apps running like play.tv or anything else then removing them may be your best bet.  Let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RPF8eBQA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-19T23:50:32.396+0000)
>
> This issue is usually a cause of third party programs being used, and not interacting well with league.  If you have any apps running like play.tv or anything else then removing them may be your best bet.  Let me know if that helps.

I mean I was doing homework on Testout, but other then that I had no third party applications being used. Odd.
